sourcesContent:
<template>
<el-card class="box-card">
	<el-breadcrumb separator="/" class="bread">
    <el-breadcrumb-item v-for="item of NameList" :key="item.meta.title">
      {{ item.meta.title }}
    </el-breadcrumb-item>
  </el-breadcrumb>
</el-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "breadCrumb",
  mounted() {
  },
  computed: {
    NameList() {
      return this.$route.matched;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.box-card{
	background-color: #fff;
	width:100vw;
	

}
</style>
